description: {"blocks":[{"key":"deq2v","text":"This protocol describes the procedures for expression and purification of the active autophagy-specific human PI3KC3-C1 kinase complex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: PI3KC3-C1, kinase, expression, Sf9, purification, autophagy
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"455co","text":"Proteins' parameters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar1s8","text":"ProteinMW (kDa)Epsilon (M-1cm-1)GST-C3cs-mCherry-ATG14L109135110GST-C3cs-ATG14L81,7100730Vps15155159630Vps34102115630Beclin5254890GST-PI3KC3-C1390,7430880GST-mCherry-PI3KC3-C1418 315250","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":185}],"data":{}},{"key":"el608","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qqv8","text":"Materials and Reagents - Sf9 insect cells - SF921 medium with antibiotics 100 IU/ml Penicillin and 100 μg/ml Streptomycin - sterile cell culture hood - 27°C shaker incubator - sterile flasks and pipettes - douncer 40 mL - Virus coding for GST-C3-ATG14/Vps34/Vps15/BECN1 (SMC1326/SM014, Addgene ) or GST-C3-mCherry-ATG14/Vps34/Vps15/BECN1 (SMC1327/SM015, Addgene ). Note:All the CDSs are codon-optimized for insect cell expression system (purchased from GenScript). The final poli-cystronic constructs were cloned via Golden Gate approach by the Vienna BioCenter Core Facilities (VBCF) Protech Facility.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85oq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egl1p","text":"Buffers for Protein Purification LysisBuffer: 50mM Hepes pH=7.5, 300mM NaCl, 0.5% CHAPS(stock 10% CHAPS in water, filtered), Benzonase (1μl/50ml lysisbuffer), 1mM MgCl2, 1mM DTT, 1xProteaseInhibitors/50ml lysis buffer (EDTA-freeCIPtablet) + 300µl CIP (Sigma).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32},{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":10},{"style":"sub","offset":167,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o6f6","text":"Wash Buffer I: 50mM HepespH=7.5, 300mM NaCl, 0.5% CHAPS,1mM DTT;","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a07ln","text":"Wash Buffer II: 50mM HepespH=7.5, 500mM NaCl, 1mM DTT;","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1v0r0","text":"Wash Buffer III: 50mM HepespH=7.5, 300mM NaCl, 1mM DTT;","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cf9dd","text":"Gel Filtration Buffer: 25mM Hepes pH=7.5, 200mMNaCl, 1mMDTT. Note: all purification buffers are filtered and degassed. Reducing agent (DTT, Dithiothreitol) is added after degassing step.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adeff","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3b0on","text":"Columns: 5 ml GSH beads,GE Healthcare or Pierce","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o8h0","text":"- S6_10/300","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"184kt","text":"Gels:10%SDS-PAGE","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","7_2":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3k3ge","text":"Infect   culture of Sf9 cells growing in Sf921 medium with antibiotics Penicillin/Streptomycin at 1-1.5 mil/ml cells/volume at 99-100% viability in log phase with Virus 1 (V1), volume according to viral titer. Baculovirus is obtained by transfection of Sf9 cells with policystronic constructs coding for the (GST±mCherry)-PI3KC3-C1 complex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"84f9b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"69F11D80DFCA11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2n056","text":"Monitor infection and harvest cells when viability goes to 97-98%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9862","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9j92q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"am8ck","text":"Always check reporter gene fluorescence under the microscope to monitor the viral infection: when all alive cells are brightly fluorescent and only few dead -\u003e harvest! ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnn89","text":"To harvest spin down the culture at 4000 rpm, 4°C, 00:15:00 in a Sorvall RC6+ centrifuge (Thermo Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vmil","text":"To harvest spin down the culture at   in a Sorvall RC6+ centrifuge (Thermo Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c2ndu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":840,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C100B680DFCA11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a3tjq","text":"Pour off the supernatant without disturbing the cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dn1c3","text":"Gently wash the pellet 1x in cold PBS buffer on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ghjc","text":"Centrifuge again and remove PBS.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pc2p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FF478DB0DFCA11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qtsm","text":"Flash freeze cell pellet in liquid nitrogen and store at  until purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"efuag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1127AA10DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cs8v8","text":"All steps are to be carried   or at   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a243l","text":"Re-suspend the cell pellet corresponding to   culture in  ice cold Lysis buffer; gently stir at  avoiding bubbling until pellet dissolves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4o8kv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2E88B8B0DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"37AFB560DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"3D713FF0DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"4262A940DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"444F5E10DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"37njs","text":"Mechanically lyse the cells passing them through a pre-cooled 40ml vol. douncer repeating for 3x: 10x pestle A followed by 10x pestle B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d587g","text":"Clear the lysate by spinning it at   in a Ti45 Rotor for  at   using Beckman centrifuge.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":88,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3elm2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"25000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5631EB70DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":0,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":0,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"5A921140DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5D340C50DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"52267550DFCB11ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6b8lb","text":"In the meanwhile, wash    mL slurry GSH beads stored in 20% Ethanol (Pierce or Glutathione Sepharose 4B) with milliQ water and finally equilibrate them in cold WBI. Spin beads at  , brake=2 in a 5810R centrifuge (Eppendorf).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":160,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":179,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9k86c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3-5","error":false,"guid":"C4E8E9C0E06511ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EDBA96F0E06511ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9em6t","text":"Allow lysate incubation with beads for     , gently rolling the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f5dre","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"36BA5570E06611ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3F35F6F0E06611ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mkph","text":"Wash beads 2x with a fixed volume of WBI.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct51d","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ct713","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":71},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":83},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":89}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7mp5k","text":"Each wash can be performed by gently inverting the tube a few times at  -\u003e spin at   for  .","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"caofs","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6E9CD260E06611ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"1":{"data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"72DC77E0E06611ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"centrifuge"},"2":{"data":{"duration":180,"guid":"758F14C0E06611ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ci47v","text":"Collect sample for \"sup WI\" and \"beads WBI\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qicc","text":"Wash beads 2x in WBII. Collect sample for \"sup WII\" and \"beads WBII\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a66o2","text":"Wash beads 2x in WBIII. Collect sample for \"sup WIII\" and \"beads WBIII\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6tgb","text":"Check all fractions on a 10% SDS-gel stained with Coomassie Brilliant Blue (see attached pdf below for example gel).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b8eti","text":"Collect sample for gel electrophoresis before cleavage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj880","text":"Incubate beads   gently rolling at   with C3 protease to cleave off the GST-tag.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"64cg4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"142E8890E06711ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1A1F1260E06711ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8h92","text":" Spin down beads and collect the supernatant containing cleaved/eluted protein. Filter elution through a 0.2µm filter syringe to remove beads and concentrate down to   using a 30kDa cut-off Amicon filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":166,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kgi6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dnihb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eig0f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"5A6D8771E06711EC9A760A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":36}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6ntoo","text":"Centrifugation steps are kept short  to avoid protein local concentration/aggregation on the filter. Gently pipette the sample to resuspend the protein between centrifugation steps.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ac1ma","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6A19C5D0E06711ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cc1p","text":"Spin down the sample in a table top centrifuge for   at   to pellet eventual aggregates, collect supernatant and inject   sample onto a S6_10/300 Gel Filtration column pre-equilibrated in Gel Filtration Buffer at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":120,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":213,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5eae5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BA6AAF90E06711ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BC95CCF0E06711ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"984D0340E06711ECBC1C7967535420E9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B585D600E1FF11EC98B4FDCB34D54435","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ktu5","text":"After the run, check fractions containing the protein of interest on gel and pool them. Concentrate down to reach the desired concentration, flash freeze in liquid nitrogen and store at -80 °C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t5fd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eh2uq","text":"      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":2,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"88r1e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":null,"entityMap":null}},"1":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"279F5E70F17B11EC964A55CF5206C7A0","id":258456,"original_name":"Gel Filtration GST_mCh_PI3KC3_C1.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h6n2bh99p.pdf"}},"2":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"44948BE0F17B11EC964A55CF5206C7A0","id":258457,"original_name":"SEC_PI3KC3_C1.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h6n3bh99p.pdf"}},"3":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"6C6E4480F17B11EC964A55CF5206C7A0","id":258458,"original_name":"GSTPI3KC3_C1 purification_2020.06.16.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/h6n4bh99p.pdf"}}}}
